item.title: Where do u edit the starting outfit
item.dc:creator: @darkgama13 darkgama13
item.description:
@darkgama13 wrote:

you go to player . java and look for “Giving the player an unique look” if ity is in there if not look for “playerEquipment” there your welcome

it should look like this

playerEquipment[playerHat]=2910; playerEquipment[playerCape]=4405; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=2906; playerEquipment[playerShield]=3842; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=2495; playerEquipment[playerHands]=2912; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=2904; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4587; [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 09, 2008, 09:57:04 PM[/size][hr]oh i forgot just look in the items.config file for your items to put on the starting charater

Read full topic
